General.Name: Nanfang Ventilator Co Ltd
General.Description: Nanfang Ventilator Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures HVAC products in China. The company offers axial flow fan and centrifugal blower fans; seamless and stainless steel pipes, forge pieces, carbon steel products, and alloy steel pipes; and nuclear fans and dampers. Its products are used in nuclear power, petrochemical, coal chemical, metro, tunnel and civil architecture, and other industries. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Foshan, China.
General.Address: No.31 San Huan West Road, Foshan, China, 528225
